key_risks: Legal challenges, including patent infringement lawsuits with Apple Inc.
Regulatory and compliance risks, particularly with FDA scrutiny.
Financial performance issues, with Q2 2023 revenue falling short of estimates.
Strategic missteps, notably the acquisition of Sound United.
Intense market competition from established players like Medtronic and Philips.
controversies: High-profile patent infringement lawsuits with Apple Inc.
Scrutiny from the FDA regarding compliance practices.
Investigation into officers and directors by Kahn Swick & Foti.
social_issues: Potential impact on patient care due to regulatory and legal challenges.
governance_issues: CEO ousted from the board, raising leadership stability concerns.
Governance concerns highlighted by the investigation into officers and directors.

sources.title: $250M Win in Apple's Patent Infringement Case Against Masimo ...
sources.snippet: Apple Inc. V. Masimo Corporation Et Al Case Background On October 20, 2022, Apple Inc. filed a patent infringement lawsuit against Masimo Corporation for violating its smartwatch and wireless charger design patents. The case was filed in the United States District Court, Delaware (Wilmington). Judge Jennifer L. Hall presided over this case.

sources.title: Masimo CEO Ousted from the Board; Future of Company in Question
sources.snippet: In March, Masimo revealed plans to separate from its controversial consumer business.
